committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to amend the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to alter the prohibitions on the hunting, taking, capture, or killing of migratory birds by the use of live birds as decoys or the use of baiting, and to increase the penalty for a violation of such prohibitions.
short_title: Migratory Bird Treaty Clarification Amendments of 1988

summary.text: Migratory Bird Treaty Clarification Amendments of 1988 - Amends the Migratory Bird Act to alter the prohibitions of the Migratory Bird Treaty on the hunting, taking, capture, or killing of migratory birds by the use of live birds as decoys or the use of baiting. Increases the criminal penalties for violations.

titles.title: Migratory Bird Treaty Clarification Amendments of 1988

A bill to amend the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to alter the prohibitions on the hunting, taking, capture, or killing of migratory birds by the use of live birds as decoys or the use of baiting, and to increase the penalty for a violation of such prohibitions.
